task_text: I'm joining Bellini soon. Where can I read about how time tracking works, and what are the main reasons we track time?

text_blocks: I can see you're accessing this from our public website (is_public=true). While I'm happy to welcome you to Bellini, I need to let you know that our internal documentation, including time tracking procedures, is only accessible to employees.

input.message:
Welcome to Bellini! I'm excited to hear you'll be joining us soon.

However, I'm unable to share details about our internal time tracking procedures and documentation at this time. This information is part of our internal employee resources and will be available to you once you officially start and have your employee credentials set up.

When you join, you'll have access to our internal wiki where all policies and procedures, including time tracking guidelines, are documented. Your manager or HR will help you get oriented during onboarding.

If you have any general questions about Bellini Coatings in the meantime, I'm happy to help with information about our company, locations, or the products we make!
